extension.name: Ramblers Data Retention
extension.author: Keith Grimes
extension.description:
Ramblers Data Retention Package successfully installed!

This package contains all extensions constituting the Ramblers Data Retention functionality. It provides ability to remove articles, files and other items which are outside of a retention period.

If you have any questions or problems, please visit the project site.
In case you want to uninstall Ramblers Data Retention, please use the Package to uninstall all extensions at once!
Ramblers Data Retention is published under the GNU General Public License.
